author: cnbc.com
title: Pool Corporation to Host 2017 Year End Earnings Results Conference Call
text:
COVINGTON, La., Feb. 08, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- POOLCORP (NASDAQ:POOL), will hold a conference call to discuss Year End 2017 Earnings Results on Thursday, February 15, 2018, at 10:00 a.m. Central Time (11:00 a.m. Eastern Time).
The earnings results will be released before the market opens on February 15, 2018 and will be available on the POOL website at www.poolcorp.com immediately after publishing.
The web cast is also being distributed through the Thomson StreetEvents Network. Individual investors can listen to the call at streetevents.com , Thomson’s individual investor portal, powered by www.streetevents.com . Institutional investors can access the call via Thomson StreetEvents ( www.streetevents.com ), a password-protected event management site.
Pool Corporation is the world’s largest wholesale distributor of swimming pool and related backyard products. As of December 31, 2017, POOL operated 351 sales centers in North America, Europe, South America and Australia, through which it distributes more than 160,000 national brand and private label products to more than 100,000 wholesale customers.
